info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 2:45PM EDT until July 20 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM EDT FOR SOUTHERN LAPEER AND NORTHEASTERN OAKLAND COUNTIES... At 245 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Metamora, or 7 miles south of Lapeer, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Dryden around 255 PM EDT. Imlay City and Lum around 300 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Leonard, Goodland Township, Lakeville, Attica and Thornville. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
